vendor_name: Omni Bretton Arms Inn at Mount Washington Resort
title: Heritage White Mountains Retreat near Boston with Heated Pools, Day Spa & Wine Bar
description:
Bask in the vintage aura of this beautifully restored inn-style hotel, nestled in the shadow of the magnificent White Mountains. Offering a unique blend of Victorian elegance and modern comfort, retreat to the hotel's well-appointed warmly-lit rooms, indulge in farm-to-table cuisine at the Bretton Arms Dining Room or sip on vintage wines and inspired cocktails at the Wine Bar.

Outdoor enthusiasts will love the hotel's two impressive golf courses as well as its plentiful selection of activities - from horseback riding and ziplining in summer to skiing and sleigh rides in winter. For a touch of luxury, head to the full-service spa or take a dip in one of the two heated pools to truly unwind on your New England escape.
